description:
Microsoft Dynamics CRM is a Customer Relationship Management Business Solution by Microsoft. For any business, Dynamics CRM can be utilized for Sales Force Automation, Marketing Campaigns and complete Customer Service Management as out of the box functionalities.

Microsoft Dynamics CRM is one of the hottest technology in market. A CRM Consultant earns up to $50,000 - $100,000 Per Annum.

In this course, you will learn the basics of Microsoft Dynamics CRM with lot of practical examples and practical application demo.

In this course, you will learn:

  1. Microsoft Dynamics CRM introduction from every aspect.
  2. Dynamics CRM Deployment Types
  3. Dynamics CRM Application Navigation
  4. Dynamics CRM Important Terminologies
  5. Dynamics CRM Sales Module Overview
  6. Dynamics CRM Marketing Module Overview
  7. Dynamics CRM Service Module Overview
  8. Dynamics CRM Records and Activities Creation
  9. Dynamics CRM Security Model
  10. Dynamics CRM Reporting Overview
  11. Dynamics CRM Settings and Administration Overview
  12. Course Conclusion & Next Steps
If you are a Programmer or want to be a CRM Consultant, this is the best introduction course to start your learning journey to earn more.
title: Microsoft Dynamics CRM Introduction Course
